statements: SELECT * FROM user_security
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_security
SELECT username, security_question FROM user_security
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_security WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email, security_question FROM user_security ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_security WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_security WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_security WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_security WHERE security_question = 'What is your favorite color?';
SELECT username, email FROM user_security WHERE password = 'securepassword';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 5;

SELECT u.username, t.amount, s.log_description FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN security_logs s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY t.amount DESC, s.log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, t.amount, t.timestamp FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT u.username, w.balance, sl.action FROM users u LEFT JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN security_logs sl ON u.user_id = sl.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') AND password = 'password123';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT username, email, security_question FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 54321 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE user_id = 99999 AND balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT log_timestamp, action_performed FROM security_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
